愪字的基本解释

愪
yún
忧愁的样子。
动。

愪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yún］
［《廣韻》王分切，平文，云。］
(1)忧；忧愁貌。
(2)动。
(3)同“雲”。

愪字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　愪； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页396第11
【唐韻】王分切【集韻】于分切，?音云。【說文】憂貌。从心員聲。　又【集韻】動也。　又【廣韻】于敏切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】羽敏切，?音隕。又【集韻】羽粉切，音抎。義?同。

愪字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
愪字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Stun
yún
Sad look.
move.
Stun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yún］
["Guangyun" Wang divided cut, plain text, cloud. ]
(1) Worry; sad appearance.
(2) Move.
(3) Same as "cloud".
Stun
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　愪; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 396 No. 11
[Tang Yun] Wang Diqie [Ji Yun] In Divide,? Yinyun. [Said Wen] Worry about appearance. From the heart.　[Jiyun] Move too.　 [Guang Yun] Yu Minqie [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Yu Minqie,? Yin Yu. Also 【Jiyun】cut feathers and powder, sound smashed. Righteous? Same.
